string.value: Mrs. Reade, who is in charge of keeping The Nautilus clean, says she's worried about the sanitary conditions of the ship because there has been a huge influx of mice on The Nautilus since the ship has been docked at Victoria Island. Should I help Mrs. Reade get rid of the mice?

The Nautilus has been docked at Victoria Island for some time now, and apparently that causes more rats to board the ship. Mrs. Reade is hyper-anxious having had to deal with all the vermin. I think I'll bring her 50 #bRat Traps#k. I've heard that I could buy mouse traps from the Roches in Ludibrium... \n\n#i4000095##t4000095# #b#c4000095##k / 50
We set up 50 mouse traps. I don't think we'll see any more mice around here... would we?
찍찍~ 찍찍~ 이 놈의 쥐소리... 미치겠구만. 어?? 자네는 전에 돼지의 리본을 구해다준 사람이 아닌가? 호호~ 마침 잘 왔네. \r\n#L0##b 또 무슨 일 있으신거에요?#k
역시 요새 젊은이들은 눈치가 빨라. 전에 한 번 도와줬으니 이번에도 또 도와주면 안되남?
원래 노틸러스 호는 바닷 속에 머무르는 시간이 많아서 지금까지 쥐는 그림자도 보이지 않았는데... 이 곳으로 온 뒤에 육지와 배가 붙어 있으니 쥐들이 가끔 출몰해서 걱정이야. 어젠 슈린츠가 쥐를 보고 기절할 뻔 했지.
루디브리엄에 사는 레츠들이 쥐덫을 준다고 하는데 그 쥐덫을 구해다줬으면 해. 딱 50개만 부탁헤.
힘들 것 같은감? 에휴... 이 쥐들... 어떻게 잡지.
Ahhh, all the squeakings from the rats. I can't stand it! Hey, aren't you the one that got me some ribbons from the Ribbon Pigs? Haha, good to see you!\r\n#L0##b Is there something going on again?#k
Kids these days catch on pretty quickly. You've helped me last time, and... can you help me once more?

The Nautilus usually was on the water, so you don't even sniff a rat around here... but ever since we came here, since the ship is in direct contact with the land, I see rats here and there, and that really bothers me. Shulynch saw one yesterday, and she almost fainted!
I hear that the Ratz from Ludibrium give out #bRat Trap#k, and if you can get me some, I will love you for it. I just need #b50#k.
Will that be too much for you? Sigh... what am I going to do with all these rats?
Hohoho! You're fast, just like the last time!
Now how am I going to set up these 50 rat traps? Anyway, I like how young people like you take care of things so quickly. Hahaha.
Ahhh, did you forget your promise already? I need 50 rat traps, and you can get them from Ratz in Ludibrium.
